statements.statements: $L.append="append";$L.formats={}
1 in $L.formats=displayForm in $L.wfphase
$L.altforms={}
for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(altForm in $L.wfphase)) do ($L.i in $L.altforms=2 in $L.i in altForm in $L.wfphase)
$L.formats=$L.formats+denull(nullsub($L.altforms, {}))
$L.thisphase.sql=$L.wfsql+" and phaseName=\""+phaseName in $L.wfphase+"\""
if (not (null(denull($L.formats)))) then ($L.format.sql="name isin "+str($L.formats)) else ($L.format.sql="false")

$L.rulesets=denull(nullsub(onCreateRules in $L.wfphase, {}))+denull(nullsub(onUpdateRules in $L.wfphase, {}))+denull(nullsub(onDeleteRules in $L.wfphase, {}))+denull(nullsub(afterUpdateRules in $L.wfphase, {}))+denull(nullsub(initRules in $L.wfphase, {}))+denull(nullsub(onDisplayRules in $L.wfphase, {}))+denull(nullsub(afterEnterRules in $L.wfphase, {}))
if (not (null(denull($L.rulesets)))) then ($L.ruleset.sql="id isin "+str($L.rulesets)) else ($L.ruleset.sql="false")
$L.tRules={}
for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(manualTransition in $L.wfphase)) do ($L.tRules=$L.tRules+denull(nullsub(6 in $L.i in manualTransition in $L.wfphase, {})))
for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(autoTransition in $L.wfphase)) do ($L.tRules=$L.tRules+denull(nullsub(3 in $L.i in autoTransition in $L.wfphase, {})))
$L.tRules=$L.tRules+denull(nullsub(defaultTransitionRules in $L.wfphase, {}))
for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(action in $L.wfphase)) do ($L.tRules=$L.tRules+{2 in $L.i in action in $L.wfphase})
if (not (null(denull($L.tRules)))) then ($L.tRules.sql="id isin "+str($L.tRules)) else ($L.tRules.sql="false")
if (not (null(denull(approvals in $L.wfphase)))) then ($L.approval.sql="name isin "+str(denull(approvals in $L.wfphase))) else ($L.approval.sql="false")
if (not (null(denull(alerts in $L.wfphase)))) then ($L.alert.sql="name isin "+str(denull(alerts in $L.wfphase))) else ($L.alert.sql="false")
$L.tMsg.sql="message.id like \"*"+phaseName in $L.wfphase+"_"+workflowName in $L.wfphase+"_"+$L.wf.file+"*\" and class#\"wf\" and syslanguage~=\"xxx\""
if (not (null(denull($L.rulesets)))) then ($L.rMsg.sql="message.id isin "+str($L.rulesets)+" and class#\"local:RuleSet\" and syslanguage~=\"xxx\"") else ($L.rMsg.sql="false")
if (not (null(denull($L.tRules)))) then ($L.r2Msg.sql="message.id isin "+str($L.tRules)+" and class#\"local:RuleSet\" and syslanguage~=\"xxx\"") else ($L.r2Msg.sql="false")
$L.pMsg.sql="message.id like \"*local:"+phaseName in $L.wfphase+";"+$L.wf.file+"\" and class#\"wf\" and syslanguage~=\"xxx\""
